original_text: Neither did we eat any man's bread for nought; but wrought with labour and travail night and day, that we might not be chargeable to any of you:
korean_text: 누구에게서든지 음식을 값없이 먹지 않고 오직 수고하고 애써 주야로 일함은 너희 아무에게도 폐를 끼치지 아니하려 함이니

sentences.original_text: Neither did we eat any man's bread for nought;
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 아무의 빵도 공짜로 먹지 않았으며

sentences.original_text: but wrought with labour and travail night and day,
that we might not be chargeable to any of you:
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 중 누구에게도 부담이 되지 않으려 함이라
